levels.description: Operator equipped with this item gains SP recovery <@ba.vup>+0.2</>/s; when there are at least <@ba.vup>3</> Operators of different Tiers on the field, the equipped Operator recovers an additional <@ba.vup>1</> SP every <@ba.vup>4</>s; when there are at least <@ba.vup>5</> Operators of different Tiers on the field, all Operators recover an additional <@ba.vup>2</> SP every <@ba.vup>4</>s
